Trigger An opponent within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

Requirements You are using an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Aldori Dueling Sword] to parry.

You riposte with your Aldori dueling sword when your enemy leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike against or attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm] the triggering opponent using your Aldori dueling sword.
